beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* starts a servlet that listens for HTTP requests * applies a simple filter to records * outputs to stdout
It is designed to illustrate a simple adaptor.
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config simple.xml
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar

bean.description: Defines the adaptor - arranges other beans into a processing pipeline
Starts up an HTTP server on indicated port
Converts an ordered map to XML
By default (with no filename specified) writes to the console
Exposes a JMX interface via HTTP, on indicated port
